channel.title: Posts on barvey hirdman @ brvy.win
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on barvey hirdman @ brvy.win

item.title: Theme Philosophy: DMDM
item.description: The theme I’m using for this blog is very barebones. I’m sure there are existing themes like this for Hugo but when the thought of this blog formed in my head I had a few principles regarding how I want to create and maintain it. The first - and most important - point was it all has to be done by me - well all except Hugo - which includes the theme as well.

item.title: First Post
item.description: Yo, this is the first post on this blog which will hopefully get better over time. I created it because recently I’ve been feeling the itch to write about the shit that’s happening to me and to share some shit I see/hear/do. The theme is very minimalistic, my own creation - even though it’s mostly just a decomposition if anything. If y’all like it, head over to https://vcs.brvy.win/barveyhirdman/dmdm where you can get it.
